hotel_name: The Westin Las Vegas Hotel & Spa
review_text: Bad: Difficult to reach reservation staff (no tollfree number, nobody answering phone during business hours, long waits on hold), inflexibility in changing a reservation a week in advance, not enough towels, toilet too low and tub too high. A bit pricey... Good: Location, quality of free toiletries
review_title: Close to Monorail, High Roller, and Linq mall
